name: Dungeon Creator
summary: This is an online 2D platform game about dungeon, where you can build scenes and take adventures. You can not only design your own dungeon, but also challenge dungeons of other game players.We provide a wealth of dungeon game material. It's totally up to you to decide the layout of the entire dungeon, as well as the placement of each trap and enemy!Also you can take adventures in almost unlimited number of dungeons created by other players, plunder their treasure, and show them your super game skills!
